name: mocker-api
description: This is dev support mock RESTful API.

scripts.doc: lerna exec --scope mocker-api -- typedoc src/index.ts src/delay.ts --name mocker-api --out docs/type
scripts.build: lerna exec --scope mocker-api -- tsbb build --disable-babel --file-names src/bin/mocker.ts --file-names src/delay.ts
scripts.watch: lerna exec --scope mocker-api -- tsbb watch --disable-babel --file-names src/bin/mocker.ts --file-names src/delay.ts
scripts.example:base: lerna exec --scope mocker-api -- npm run api
